description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Final Failure is an action platformer where the players have to choose between the sniper, the gunner, the defender or the medic to defeat a group of evil robots. Each class has a unique weapon and a special ability. The game supports up to 4 players in local coop.
description.short: Final Failure is an action platformer where the players have to choose between the sniper, the gunner, the defender or the medic to defeat a group of evil robots. Each class has a unique weapon and a special ability. The game supports up to 4 players in local coop.
